title: Normalizing flows for density estimation with TensorFlow Probability
description: Using TensorFlow Probability's Bijector API one can easily implement custom normalizing flows. This notebook shows how it can be done using MAFs as an example

title: Causal structure learning with VAEs
description: Learning cause-effect mechanisms among a set of random variables is not only of great epistemological interest but also a fascinating statistical problem. In this notebook we implement a graph variational autoencoder to learn the DAG of a structural equations model and compare it to greedy equivalent search

title: On sequential regression models
description: Sequential models are a special type of ordinal regression models, but additionally assume that categories can only be reached sequentially. This case study shows the difference to conventional ordinal models
